During the flight to Kup's position, Megatron's internal sensors ran diagno=
stics on the small spark chamber held in a compartment.=A0 It was very curi=
ous, to ind a spark still functioning after so long.=A0 But the scans revea=
led nothing unusual about it, so for now it'd just have to sit.
=A0
Transfo=
rming and landing before the old Autobot, Megatron stared down at him. 
=A0=

"So where is he?=A0 Where is Rodimus Prime?"

Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>During the flight to Kup's position, Megatron's internal sensors ran diagnostics on the small spark chamber held in a compartment.  It was very curious, to ind a spark still functioning after so long.  But the scans revealed nothing unusual about it, so for now it'd just have to sit.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Transforming and landing before the old Autobot, Megatron stared down at him. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>"So where is he?  Where is Rodimus Prime?"<BR><BR>--- On <B>Mon, 9/22/08, Lady Barbossa <I><MaximaSR74@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">From: Lady Barbossa <MaximaSR74@...><BR>Subject: Re: A Spark of Hope<BR>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com<BR>Date: Monday, September 22, 2008, 12:17 AM<BR><BR>
<DIV id=yiv74407612>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<DIV>Hidden and silenced. The spark dimly glowed within the deep recesses of <BR>another. Unsure and unaware of it's surroundings, of it's situation, of <BR>it's future. <BR>The poor spark remained isolated and silent. But it was a miracle that <BR>a spark lasted this long. <BR><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
